document_data.caption: Seen from an aerial view, the House of Two Hands stands in the upper left
document_data.name: House of Two Hands
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Two Hands''' was a [[monastery]] in the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]], belonging to the [[Order of the Even-Handed]].
document_data.Location: This building was located on the slopes of [[Mount Waterdeep]], overlooking [[Smuggler's Bay]].
document_data.Structure: This monastery stood three stories tall.
document_data.History: For much of its existence this building was a villa. Then in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] it was purchased by the Order of the Even-Handed with the help of some financial backing from [[Piergeiron the Paladinson]].
